meanings.definition: Counterterrorists: individuals or groups who work to prevent or respond to acts of terrorism.
meanings.sent1: The brave counterterrorists trained hard to protect their country.
meanings.sent2: The counterterrorists swiftly apprehended the terrorist before any harm was done.
meanings.sent3: The counterterrorists organized a surprise birthday party to prevent the sadness of their friend.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, the counterterrorists are the shield against the chaos of terrorism.
meanings.sent5: The image of the counterterrorists standing tall against the threat of terrorism is inspiring.

meanings.definition: Counterterrorists: the opposing force to terrorists in a conflict or operation.
meanings.sent1: The counterterrorists strategized to outsmart the terrorists in the upcoming mission.
meanings.sent2: The counterterrorists engaged in a fierce battle with the terrorists to protect innocent lives.
meanings.sent3: During the paintball game, the counterterrorists and terrorists had a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: The counterterrorists and terrorists clashed like fire and water in their ideologies.
meanings.sent5: The role of counterterrorists is crucial in maintaining peace and security in the world.
